H0.text: Technology is the goal of using knowledge for practical purposes, whereas science aims to increase knowledge.

H1.text: Advancement is the goal of using knowledge for practical purposes, whereas the goal of science is to increase knowledge.

H2.text: Invention is the goal of using knowledge for practical purposes, while science aims to increase knowledge.

H3.text: Industry is the goal of using knowledge for practical purposes, whereas science aims to increase knowledge.

A4.text: science concerns itself with what is, technology with what is to be.

A5.text: technology took on the meaning: the systemic use of knowledge to practical ends.
